getAllUserRewards(address[],address).details: Returns a list all rewards of a user, including already accrued and unrealized claimable rewards

params.assets: List of incentivized assets to check eligible distributions

returns.unclaimedAmounts: The list of unclaimed amount of rewards*

getAssetDecimals(address).details: Returns the decimals of an asset to calculate the distribution delta

returns._0: The decimals of an underlying asset

getAssetIndex(address,address).details: Calculates the next value of an specific distribution index, with validations.

params.reward: The reward token of the incentivized asset

returns._0: The old index of the asset distribution
returns._1: The new index of the asset distribution*

getDistributionEnd(address,address).details: Gets the end date for the distribution

params.reward: The reward token of the incentivized asset

returns._0: The timestamp with the end of the distribution, in unix time format*

getEmissionManager().details: Returns the address of the emission manager. Deprecated: This getter is maintained for compatibility purposes. Use the `EMISSION_MANAGER()` function instead.

getRewardsByAsset(address).details: Returns the list of available reward token addresses of an incentivized asset

returns._0: List of rewards addresses of the input asset*

getRewardsData(address,address).details: Returns the configuration of the distribution reward for a certain asset

params.reward: The reward token of the incentivized asset

returns._0: The index of the asset distribution
returns._1: The emission per second of the reward distribution
returns._2: The timestamp of the last update of the index
returns._3: The timestamp of the distribution end*

getRewardsList().details: Returns the list of available reward addresses

returns._0: List of rewards supported in this contract*

getUserAccruedRewards(address,address).details: Returns the accrued rewards balance of a user, not including virtually accrued rewards since last distribution.

params.reward: The address of the reward token

returns._0: Unclaimed rewards, not including new distributions*

getUserAssetIndex(address,address,addres.details: Returns the index of a user on a reward distribution

params.reward: The reward token of the incentivized asset

returns._0: The current user asset index, not including new distributions*

getUserRewards(address[],address,address.details: Returns a single rewards balance of a user, including virtually accrued and unrealized claimable rewards.

params.assets: List of incentivized assets to check eligible distributions
params.reward: The address of the reward token

setDistributionEnd(address,address,uint3.details: Sets the end date for the distribution

params.newDistributionEnd: The end date of the incentivization, in unix time format*
params.reward: The reward token that incentives the asset

setEmissionPerSecond(address,address[],u.details: Sets the emission per second of a set of reward distributions

params.newEmissionsPerSecond: List of new reward emissions per second
params.rewards: List of reward addresses are being distributed
